title: Electric golem
data:

| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An animated figure made completely of electricity, created in some demented wizard's experiment.***“I sing the Body electric” -Walt Whitman, “I Sing the Body Electric”, \_Leaves of Grass\_. 1867. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Electric golems** are one of the more dangerous monsters in [the Realm of Zot](/The_Realm_of_Zot "The Realm of Zot"). They move as fast as [spriggans](/Spriggan "Spriggan") and [Blink](/Blink "Blink") constantly while shooting lightning or annihilating you in melee. They're much more resistant to [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") and [poison](/Poison "Poison") than they are to [fire](/Fire "Fire") and [cold](/Cold "Cold").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                           |                                                      |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") (3d20) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                   | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- [Electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") resistance and decent [AC](/AC "AC") are mandatory for survival. If you lack rElec, quaff a [potion of resistance](/Potion_of_resistance "Potion of resistance") while fighting an electric golem. If you can't kill it before the potion wears off (or if you don't have any potions), [teleport](/Teleport "Teleport") away.
  - Don't even attempt [Zot:5](/Zot:5 "Zot:5") unless you have electricity resistance (though you should have found at least *something* by the time you get there).
- Even if you do have rElec, don't let an electric golem catch you where it can [multizap](/Multizap "Multizap") you. Fight them with either open space or metal walls behind you, and be prepared to move if it blinks to a more dangerous angle.
- Electric golems have high EV, so you may wish to use unavoidable spells like [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") or [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike").
  - While electric golems cannot be affected by [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") like other [golems](/List_of_constructs#Golems "List of constructs") can, they aren't immune to shrapnel (in fact, their low AC makes it rather effective). [Earth Elementalists](/Earth_Elementalist "Earth Elementalist") can use surrounding walls to damage them with [LRD](/LRD "LRD").

## History

- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), [flying](/Fly "Fly") would reduce damage from their electicity-branded melee attacks.

Electric golem

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all constructs, see list of constructs.

electric golem 9 
HP 89-180
HD 15
XP 3300
Speed 16
AC 5
EV 20
Will Immune
Attack1 15 (hit: electricity)
Attack2 15 (hit: electricity)
Attack3 15 (hit: plain)
Attack4 15 (hit: plain)
Resistances rF+
rC+
rElec+++
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
rSticky
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Open doors
Holiness Non-living
Size Large
Type golem, electric golem
Flags See invisible
Unbreathing
Speaks
Insubstantial
Artificial
An animated figure made completely of electricity, created in some demented wizard's experiment.

“I sing the Body electric”
-Walt Whitman, “I Sing the Body Electric”, _Leaves of Grass_. 1867.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Electric golems are one of the more dangerous monsters in the Realm of Zot. They move as fast as spriggans and Blink constantly while shooting lightning or annihilating you in melee. They're much more resistant to electricity and poison than they are to fire and cold.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Lightning Bolt (3d20) Magical flag
Slot2 Blink Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Electricity resistance and decent AC are mandatory for survival. If you lack rElec, quaff a potion of resistance while fighting an electric golem. If you can't kill it before the potion wears off (or if you don't have any potions), teleport away.
    • Don't even attempt Zot:5 unless you have electricity resistance (though you should have found at least something by the time you get there).
  • Even if you do have rElec, don't let an electric golem catch you where it can multizap you. Fight them with either open space or metal walls behind you, and be prepared to move if it blinks to a more dangerous angle.
  • Electric golems have high EV, so you may wish to use unavoidable spells like Fireball or Airstrike.
    • While electric golems cannot be affected by Lee's Rapid Deconstruction like other golems can, they aren't immune to shrapnel (in fact, their low AC makes it rather effective). Earth Elementalists can use surrounding walls to damage them with LRD.

History

  • Prior to 0.13, flying would reduce damage from their electicity-branded melee attacks.

{{version031}}
{{list of|constructs}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Electric golems''' are one of the more dangerous monsters in [[the Realm of Zot]]. They move as fast as [[spriggan]]s and [[Blink]] constantly while shooting lightning or annihilating you in melee. They're much more resistant to [[electricity]] and [[poison]] than they are to [[fire]] and [[cold]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*[[Electricity]] resistance and decent [[AC]] are mandatory for survival. If you lack rElec, quaff a [[potion of resistance]] while fighting an electric golem. If you can't kill it before the potion wears off (or if you don't have any potions), [[teleport]] away.
**Don't even attempt [[Zot:5]] unless you have electricity resistance (though you should have found at least ''something'' by the time you get there).
*Even if you do have rElec, don't let an electric golem catch you where it can [[multizap]] you. Fight them with either open space or metal walls behind you, and be prepared to move if it blinks to a more dangerous angle.
*Electric golems have high EV, so you may wish to use unavoidable spells like [[Fireball]] or [[Airstrike]].
**While electric golems cannot be affected by [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]] like other [[list of constructs#Golems|golems]] can, they aren't immune to shrapnel (in fact, their low AC makes it rather effective). [[Earth Elementalist]]s can use surrounding walls to damage them with [[LRD]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.13]], [[fly]]ing would reduce damage from their electicity-branded melee attacks.
